column2: Independently lead transitions for a business cluster or a cluster of large and multiple transitions/ engagements Train, manage, mentor and direct Program Leads and Project Managers who execute these transitions Manage and resolve issues  Build close rapport with key client managers, internal and external stakeholders Owning compliance and continuous improvement to the WNS transition methodology Strong focus on positive transition outcomes Achievement of deal financials by ensuring transitions are aligned with design Customer Experience understand client needs, wants and expectations and manage them effectively. o Metrics Delivery ensure visibility and achievement of goals from day 1 of go-live Build transition capability Identify areas for functional improvement and capability building, lead implementation of the same Provide thought leadership to make transition solutions better, cheaper and faster Identify and lead projects that improve transition effectiveness Business Development Own and review transition solutions for new deals. Support sales, solutions and business functions o Focus on realistic deliverability of solutions, highlight gaps, identify and implement systemic fixes o Handling prospective / client presentations Qualifications Core Bachelors degree (graduate) in any discipline Excellent project management skills applied to a wide range of project types, scales, complexities, domains and geographies Strong customer relationship management skills Deep understanding of different aspects of BPO business in QA, MIS, SLA, base-lining, etc.  Strong focus on deliverables - do whatever it takes to meet timelines and quality of deliverables Strong decision making skills  Focus on continuous improvement Self-starter, independent, initiator. Strong organization, presentation, interpersonal and consultative skills is a must Knowledge and/or experience or certifications in Project Management methodologies and/or Six Sigma is a plus Supplemental Maintaining an established work schedule and strong work ethic Very strong analytical, planning, organizational, and time management skills Strong research skills including gathering and analyzing data from multiple sources  Effective reporting and documentation skills Ability to maintain discretion and confidentiality Working in a cross-functional team and environment  Strong business and financial acumen Interpreting and applying rules, regulations, policies, and procedures Technologically inclined Effectively using interpersonal and communications skills including tact and diplomacy to network with entire organization and get things done by building bridges Effectively using organizational and planning skills with attention to detail and follow through BPO/BPM/ITES Transitions exp preferred (Insurance Vertical) Overall 12+ Years of experience and a min of 10+ Years of Transitions experience with Good Communication skills  Good hands on exp in Project management (Transformation and technology preferably) like App deployments, transformational projects, exposed to sales cycle, contractual obligation management etc Managing team, Ensuring HR related activities are timely closed and addressed. Should work extensively with clients and internal teams, IT, HR, Ops etc for a smooth project Transition Span of Control : 5 FTE's Work Location : Pune - Magarpatta SEZ (Hybrid - 3 days work from office) Global Support role & Should be flexible with shifts basis the region we support

column1: ADB funded - Assam Urban Sector Development Project
column2: Dear Sir/Madam, Greetings from Mukesh & Associates, an ISO 9001:2015 certified multidisciplinary consultancy firm based in Salem (Tamil Nadu), India. Please visit www.mukeshassociates.com for more information. We are looking for the following positions for  ADB funded - Assam Urban Sector Development Project. We are submitting the Expression of Interest (EOI). Project Location:  Guwahati, Assam  Project Duration:  5 years Input Required:  (Full Time / Intermittent) 1.  Team Leader/ Senior Civil Engineer Cum Project Management Expert:  Master in Hydraulics / Environmental / Construction Management with total 20 years of experience in construction / project management of infrastructure projects with minimum 5 years in leadership roles. Experience in multilateral funded projects will be preferred. Experience in FIDIC contract conditions. Experience in large drainage and water supply projects would be Required. 2.  Deputy Team Leader cum Construction Supervision Resident Engineer:  Post graduate in environmental engineering construction management Or related field with 12 years construction related experience. Experience in externally funded projects. 3.  Skills Development and TVET Specialist:  Masters degree in management, development studies, social sciences or other relevant discipline, and more than 8 years experience in skill development and TVET. Familiarity with Indias national skills qualification standards is a must. Past experience of working with ITIs and/or in a reputed vocational training agency in India will be preferred. Exposure to international technical education programs will be given additional weightage. 4.  Water Supply & NRW Expert:  Post graduate in environmental / water supply engineering with 12 years of experience in DMA based distribution and automated metering, NRW Management for Water Supply & NRW projects. Experience in externally funded projects. 5.  Water Supply SCADA Expert:  Bachelors in engineering with post graduate in environmental / water supply engineering with 12 years of experience in implementing PLC / SCADA under water supply projects. 6.  Project Performance and Monitoring cum MIS Expert:  Bachelors Degree in Engineering / Planning / Degree/Diploma/Certification in IT with minimum 8 years of experience in project management, monitoring and reporting of infrastructure projects. Experience in developing and operationalizing computer-based management information system. Experience in ADB / World Bank funded projects would be preferred. 7.  Procurement cum Contract Management Specialist:  Graduate Civil Engineer or equivalent with minimum total 12 years of experience in procurement / contract management. Experience in multilateral funded projects will be preferred. Experience in FIDIC contract conditions. 8.  Wastewater and Drainage Engineer:  bachelor degree in environmental / water supply engineering with 12 years of experience in externally funded projects in large drainage for cities. 9.  Architect:  Bachelor degree in Architecture having minimum 12 years experience in large institutional building design and supervision of works. 10.  Structural Engineer:  Master degree in structural engineering with a bachelor degree in civil engineering having minimum 10 years of experience in civil infrastructure and building projects in structural design aspect for earthquake resilient structure. 11.  Electromechanical Engineer:  Bachelor?? degree in electrical / mechanical engineering with Minimum 10 years??experience in designing, construction supervision and quality assurance of electrical and mechanical pumping station equipment.. Post graduate degree in Electrical / Instrumentation will be preferred.  12.  Accounts and Finance Specialist:  Post graduate degree in accounting with minimum 7 years??experience in public and project accounting. Experience in ADB financed projects. 13.  Environmental Specialist:  Master or higher degree in environmental management, environmental sciences, civil engineering, chemical engineering, or any related field. At least 15 years of professional work experience of which minimum 10 years in environmental impact assessment and mitigation planning for infrastructure projects including leading environmental impact assessment studies, experience on urban infrastructure projects and working with an international financing institution like ADB, WB, etc. 14.  Health and Safety Specialist:  Bachelor in Engineering or related field with minimum of 5 years??experience in designing, supervising or monitoring OHS activities in the construction related field. Shall be conversant with the State statues w.r.t. Occupational Health & Safety Standards. Shall possess minimum 2 years??experience in Externally funded projects (ADB, World Bank or other multilateral and bilateral development banks such as AIIB, JICA, etc.) 15.  Social Safeguards Specialist:  Post graduate degree in social science or equivalent stream with minimum 8 years of experience in preparing safeguard documents and safeguard compliance monitoring. Experience in ADB / World Bank funded projects would be preferred. 16.  GIS/Asset Management Specialist:  Degree in Civil Engineering / Post graduate degree in Geography / Geology / Planning. Certificate of qualification in developing GIS. Experience in developing GIS based asset mapping in at least one urban project. Minimum experience of 8 years in similar works required. 17.  IT Specialist:  Degree in Computer Science / IT or Bachelor / Master of Computer Applications with 3 years of experience. 18.  Training and Capacity Building Expert:   Post graduate with proven track record of conducting public awareness and capacity building programs for multi laterally aided projects. Minimum 10 years of experience. Should you be interested, please confirm to take part in the project and forward us your latest CV. Looking forward to hearing from you at the earliest. Regards, J. Sumathi Manager - HR +91 99443 43800 sumathi@mukeshassociates.com
column11: Water Supply, Procurement, Environmental, Structural, Electromechanical, Wastewater, GIS/Asset Management, Social Safeguards, Architect, NRW, MIS, Health and Safety, Drainage Engineer, SCADA

column2: Role description: his role is part of Arcadis Global Excellence Centre (GEC) and will join our 3,000+ talented individuals working in India, Romania, and Philippines, in partnership with Arcadis offices globally.?The GEC brings key capabilities and capacity to support our clients seamlessly around the world.?For those in GEC there are options to be dedicated to one country; developing deep knowledge and strong relationships, as well as opportunities to be part of teams working truly globally as a centre of excellence, offering diversity and variety.?Arcadians are by nature, globally minded and culturally aware, and Arcadis strongly believes in flexibility which enables change over time as your career progresses. The GEC model is well embedded in Arcadis, and the strong relationships that exist between our global offices are truly unique.?Overall leadership of Business Area (BA) team of professional staff, ensuring growth of capabilities and capacity to meet business demands, delivery of high-quality project outcomes and nurturing and developing talent within their teams Key Shared Accountabilities Responsible?for?delivering?team?metrics?in?conjunction?with?Discipline?Director Key interface with Discipline Director and Service Delivery Manager for performance of?team,?development?of?capabilities?and?progress?on?standardization?and?automation Descison Rights Drives?team?efficiency,?enhancing?capability?development?&?technical?skillset in?line with professional standards. Quality?of?project deliverables. Influences?recruitment?decisions,?capability?development Important Metrices and Profile Requirement The candidate should have a bachelor or master's degree and experience leading and growing a significant business function within a multinational engineering or professional services firm. For this role Arcadis values professional experience across the following priority areas:  Leading?transformation:? Ability?to?bring?people?on?a?journeyto?the?unknown,?creating a sense of stability and security in uncertain times, avoiding change fatigue. Managing change:? Managing change at a management level, growing a?start-up, or leading change into other market/services or products, operating with new business models, turning around underperforming businesses, programs or teams and driving standardization and automation. Data and technology:? Adopting data-driven decision making, leveraging data to create and demonstrate value. Tech savvy and comfortable and curious about technologies. Aligned to the Arcadis Leadership model we seek Arcadians with a strong fit to our leadership success profile, to build and drive our culture of inclusion, accountability, human-centricity, and sustainability. Successful Arcadians will possess strong learning agility, combined with a balanced mix of being curious, driving success and igniting passion. Be?curious: Demonstrate?anddevelop?curiosity?in?oneself?and?others,?bringingclients?and?Arcadians on a journey of discovery and co-creation. Have?a?global,?strategic,?and?future?thinking?mindset. Are?digitally-savvy,?entrepreneurial?and?innovative. Build?organizational?networks?that?are?value-adding,?engaging?and?purposeful. Incorporate?a?human-centric,?experimentation-led?and?continuous?learningmindset?to lead innovation and transformation.Actively?engage?diversepoints?of?viewand?manage?healthyissues-based?conflict Drive?success: Create?a?sense?of?shared?ownershipand?accountability?balancingthis?with decisiveness and holding others to account for delivery. Take ownership?forown responsibility,?creating clarity?and?motivating?and?aligning others. Internalize?organizational?goals,?making?them?onesown?personal?stretchgoals. Are?outcomes?focused?and?tackle?challenges?head-on. Demonstrate?commercial?acumen?in?general,?and?specifically?with?regards?to sustainable solutions. Actively?shape?the?future?of?the?organization. Ignite?passion: Personally,?role?model?own?a?commitment?to?improving?qualityof?life?and?putting sustainability at the core. Apply an adaptive style to engagement that is culturally sensitive and appeals to the personal needs of others Bring?clarity?and?manage?anxiety?in?others,?throughclear?communication?and?inspiringstorytelling. Integrate their work, helping others make the connection between their work and the bigger picture. Maintain personal resilience and rebound from setbacks?and help others to do the?same. Build trust through authenticity, demonstrating integrity and courage regarding own convictions. Role accountabilities: Provide?professional?leadership?in?their BA?team at?a?management?level, establishing and?consolidating?relationships?with?seniorstaff?in?BA?offices,?takingownership?for?the delivery of the GECs technical capability, supporting the delivery of tasks or specialized components of projects. Plan and drive the development of Arcadis??capability and capacity in the BA team, aligned with Discipline wide plans to meet project demands. Work with Talent Acquisition?and?Learning?Development?to?ensure BA?team?needs?are?understood?and plans to meet them are in place. Drive a culture of project delivery excellence within the BA team, ensuring that adequate talent is available and assigned to lead on project delivery from a technical and task management perspective. Ensure the delivery of projects/tasks within the team is in accordance with Management?Systemsto?meet?time,quality,?budgetary and?healthand?safety?targets. Engage with the senior leadership in the BA they collaborate with and champion the involvement and inclusion of GEC capability in their delivery model using SOPs to standardize the delivery approach. Drive the implementation of the GEC and Discipline strategy within the BA team, including managing changes associated with the operating model. Communicate change and manage transformation within the team, aligned to the strategic direction of the company, GECs and Discipline. Develop and implement workforce plans regarding building capability and capacity of the teams over the medium to long term in consultation with the Discipline Director, BA stakeholders, Workforce Planners and Service Delivery Managers. Manage day to day workload within the teams to ensure that direct and indirect hour targets are achieved, working in close collaboration with the Discipline Director and Workforce Planner. Work?with?Discipline?Directorand?Service?DeliveryManagers?to?define?and?implement standardization and automation initiatives within the team. Ensure?a?strong?focus?on?careerdevelopment,?driving?a?culture?of?best?practicearound GPS and empowerment of staff to own the development of their careers. Foster?a?strong?cultureof?health?and?safety?awarenessand?practices?withinthe?teams, setting a leadership example and holding senior staff to account. Manage staff engagement levels by drawing insights from tools such as YourVoice, identifying engagement drivers and developing and implementing action plans to ensure a well engaged team. Manage team shape and size within the discipline to ensure that adequate levels of seniority for leadership, task management and technical roles are in place to support current and future delivery requirements. Collaborate with other BA Managers and GBA Manager within Disciplines to ensure that capabilities are maximized across teams and projects. Drive?the development of?training and accreditation plans?which ensure that?skills are continuously improving and meet the workload requirements from the BAs Qualifications & Experience: BE/ B.Tech, ME/M.Tech (Electrical)?from?reputed and recognised University Min Experience required- 15 Years of relevant Experience
column11: Team Management, Electrical Engineering, Change Management, Leadership, Automation, Strategy, Project Delivery

column2: We are looking for a      a skilled Zscaler Engineer to join our team of cloud security experts.              In this role, the engineer will be instrumental in deploying, managing, and optimizing Zscalers suite of security solutions to fortify our enterprise clients defenses     .             This is an opportunity to join a fast-growing team of talented professionals with a lot of positive energy and enthusiasm.                This is a Part-Time, 100% remote contract role, with potential for a full-time role in the future.                                                 Responsibilities                               Implement, configure, and manage Zscaler Internet Access (ZIA) and Zscaler Private Access (ZPA) solutions for enterprise clients.                 Troubleshoot and resolve complex network and security issues related to Zscaler services.                 Conduct regular security audits to ensure compliance with industry standards and corporate policies.                 Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate Zscaler services with existing infrastructure.                 Maintain up-to-date knowledge of Zscaler products and services to recommend upgrades and enhancements.                 Provide     training and support to IT teams and end-users for best practices on Zscaler platforms.                 Develop documentation on configuration, troubleshooting procedures, and operational guidelines.                 Participate in emergency response teams to handle security incidents and      provide     post-mortem analysis.                               Qualifications                       Proven experience as a Zscaler Engineer or in a similar role within cloud security.                 Extensive knowledge of Zscaler products and administration, with ZCCA or ZCCP certification highly desirable.                 Strong foundation     in network security principles, including Zero Trust architecture.                 Familiarity with cloud infrastructure and services (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).                 Ability to work autonomously in a remote setting while      maintaining     communication and upholding collaborative team dynamics.                 Proficient in creating and managing security policies and protocols.                 Exceptional problem-solving skills and the ability to work under pressure.                 Bachelors degree in Computer Science     , Cybersecurity, or a related field, or equivalent work experience
column11: Security audit, Technical consultancy, cloud security, Architecture, Cloud, Network security, Operations, Cost optimization

Understanding of business language: Ability to work with client, shape the end-to-end solution, help translate the requirements and feature listinto user stories which can be understood by the delivery teams  Assets, Solutions and POVs:  Ability to lead a team to build Accenture level assets and commerce solutions and industry POVs related to commerce trends  Bring  your best  skills  forward  to e xcel at the role : Functional hands-on experience :on Commerce strategy areas such as Offline to Online transformation (Product), Channels (DTC & E-commerce- Process, Set Up and Scale up), Communication, Commerce Content & performance, Social commerce, Influencer marketing and growth hacking on social media  Create valid business case and strategic transformation roadmap: Good understanding of market realities, benefit to business and complexities of implementation to define strategic commerce roadmap for Clients  Use creativity and innovation:  Able to work in a fast-paced environment with the ability to abstract detail into larger patterns  Senior stakeholder management -  Experience of working with senior stakeholders for alignment and buy-in of projects led by the candidate  Read about us. Qualification Y our  experi ence counts! MBA preferably in Sales & Marketing  At least minimum 12 14 years of total experience with minimum10 years of digital commerce functional experience in areas of E-commerce- Strategy, GTM; Product;Commerce Operations; Growth & P&L Management; Performance Marketing (E-com & DTC), Digital Marketing & Transformation; Content Marketing; Social Commerce & Growth Hacking etc.  What's  in it for you? An opportunity to work on

column2: Interested may share profile @ "Arjun.thakur2@wns.com " Designation - Director / Sr. Consultant  Role - Digital Transformation Consulting for Insurance Key clients  Location - Pune  Skills - Insurance Domain and DT expereince    Key Responsibilities: Digital Strategy Development: Collaborate with clients to understand their business goals and challenges. Formulate comprehensive digital strategies aligned with organizational objectives. Identify opportunities for leveraging digital technologies to improve processes and customer experiences. Technology Assessment and Implementation: Evaluate existing technologies and infrastructure to identify gaps and opportunities for improvement. Recommend and implement cutting-edge digital solutions to drive transformation. Oversee the implementation of digital tools, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems. Change Management: Develop and execute change management strategies to facilitate the adoption of digital initiatives. Work closely with stakeholders to address concerns, manage resistance, and drive cultural change. Provide training and support to ensure the successful transition to new digital processes. Data-driven Insights: Utilize data analytics to generate insights and inform decision-making. Implement data-driven strategies to improve operational efficiency and enhance customer experiences. Risk Management: Identify potential risks associated with digital transformations and develop mitigation strategies. Ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards. Collaboration and Communication: Foster collaboration between cross-functional teams to achieve digital transformation objectives. Communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders effectively. Continuous Improvement: Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices. Drive continuous improvement initiatives to optimize digital processes and strategies.

column2: At Headfield Solutions, we are committed to driving growth and forging strategic partnerships that propel our business forward. As a Business Development professional, you will play a pivotal role in identifying new opportunities, nurturing client relationships, and contributing to our overall expansion efforts. Position Overview: We are seeking a talented and driven Business Development Executive to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building and maintaining client relationships, and driving growth for the company. This is an end to end sales and marketing position where you connect with clients across the globe. Key Responsibilities: Identify and research potential clients and business opportunities in the market. Develop and maintain relationships with key existing/new clients, shareholders and decision-makers. Understand client needs and objectives and propose solutions that meet their requirements. Collaborate with internal teams to develop tailored proposals and presentations for clients. Negotiate contracts and agreements with clients. Monitor industry trends and competitor activities to identify potential opportunities for growth. Advance potential line of business. Global client exposure - the US, the UK, Australia, Canada, etc. Market research, lead generation and converting them into closed deals Represent the company at virtual meetings with clients. Persistent in converting leads into business through email marketing, calling, etc.. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree. Proven track record of success in business development, sales, or a related field. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Excellent negotiation and presentation skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Highly motivated and target-driven. Knowledge of the Business Development/Sales/Marketing is preferred. Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite. Benefits: Competitive salary  Commission Structure Opportunities for career advancement and professional development. Both side cab Fixed Sat-Sun Off In house Meals Dynamic and supportive work environment. Shift Timings: 6:30 PM - 3:30 AM
column11: Communication Skills, Convincing Power, Strong Interpersonal Skills, Leadership Skills, Public Speaking, Sales Executive Activities, Presentation Skills, marketing, Spoken English, Lead Generation, Team Skills, Business Generation, Business Development, Interpersonal Skills

column2: Configures and supports the productive SAP ERP system in the PP/QM process area as member of the global IT organization.             Takes over support requests from the countries live in the productive SAP ERP system.     Creates data extracts as requested by the users.     Creates functional and technical design documents in collaboration with Solution Architects.     Defines and writes functional specifications and end user documentations.     Works with users to test new functions.     Work closely with other in-house consultants in cross-module collaboration.     Provides support of SAP S/4HANA SCM modules, including integration points with other SAP modules and non-SAP applications to ensure business processes are maintained in a non-disruptive manner.             Requirements         Experience in SAP ERP support for global industries.     Experience in SAP implementation/roll-out projects.     Experience in configuring and customizing of SAP modules. Production Planning (PP) and Quality Management (QM).     Experience with the SCM processes in discrete manufacturing industries.     Experience in process integration with other SAP modules.     Hands-on experience in SAP production processes (MRP run configuration, production execution, setup of routings, BOM, BOO, production version etc) and integration with logistics execution.     Knowledge in SAP PP integration with SAP ME is an advantage.     The ideal candidate is SAP certified solution consultant.     Know-how of IT support management in Service Now tool is beneficial.     Technical skills and basic experiences in applications development and/or understanding of SAP enhancement mechanism (User_exits, BadIs, Enhancements) are beneficial.         Experience   : 4 plus years in the application management of SAP S/4HANA or SAP ECC and business process management.       Qualification   : bachelors degree (or its equivalent) in Business administration, Logistics, Information Management or related field.
column11: SAP ERP, discrete manufacturing, process integration, SAP implementation, Production planning, SAP PP, Information management, Business process management, SCM, Logistics
